title: Asian Tech Stocks to Rise on Renewed AI Optimism: Markets Wrap
description: Asian technology stocks are set to gain after US equities recovered from their first back-to-back losses of the year, reviving confidence in the sector.
content: Asian technology stocks are set to gain after US equities recovered from their first back-to-back losses of the year, reviving confidence in the sector.
